description.raw:
This PR implements the DSL class to create jobs that testing the installation of a package. A generic job was added to jenkins bash scripts and created from the DSL class.

As an example, the mentor2 project is being used:

 * [Testing run](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/mentor/view/mentor2/job/install-gazebo_mentor2-pkg-trusty-amd64/4/console). Failed because still need to release the mentor packages.
